theWildCard:VelvetRoom.NAME: The Velvet Room
DESCRIPTIONS: As your feet carry you forward, you suddenly feel dizzy and lightheaded. NL When you finally reorient yourself, you find yourself in a strange room, being greeted by a strange woman in blue. NL NL "Ah, a visitor! It’s been a long time since we’ve had one – please, take a seat."
You sit down, and the woman pulls out a deck of tarot cards. NL NL "Now, why don’t we try a little divination? Your fate is in the cards, after all."
The woman deftly shuffles the deck and flips over a card, revealing . . .
"You will face great challenge and adversity. But if you persevere against even overwhelming odds, there will be a light at the end, I am sure."
"Oh? You don’t wish to hear of your fate?" NL The woman seems disappointed. NL "I understand. I suppose mortals like you may find it more interesting to be ignorant of coming events."
